TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BaseCompatibilityPreferences extends System.Object
public ref class BaseCompatibilityPreferences abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi abstract sealed BaseCompatibilityPreferences extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含指定应用程序相对于新的 WPF 功能（在 WindowsBase 程序集中）应如何运行的属性。

span.span: Contains properties that specify how an application should behave relative to new WPF features that are in the WindowsBase assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool FlowDispatcherSynchronizationContextPriority { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示信息是否有关 保存为 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether information about the is saved to the .

value.span: ，如果 有关的信息保存到 ；否则， 。

span.span: if information about the is saved to the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值取决于您的应用程序针对哪个版本的 WPF。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.0 或更低版本，则默认值为 `false` 。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.5，则默认值为 `true` 。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`. 如果使用此属性来更改 WPF 的行为，则必须在应用程序生存期的早期更改该属性的值，例如在从应用程序继承的类的构造函数中。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property's value early in the app's lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在读取值后，不能再次更改。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailure { System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions get(); void set(System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions value); };

summary.span: 定义调度程序如何应对请求处理时遇到的失败。

span.span: Defines how the dispatcher reacts to failures encountered when it requests processing.

value.span: 定义调度程序如何应对失败的值。

span.span: A value that defines how the dispatcher reacts to failures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 调度程序通过设置计时器或将消息发布到自身来响应请求处理时遇到的失败。The Windows Presentation Foundation dispatcher reacts to failures that it encounters when requesting processing by setting a timer or posting messages to itself. 如果这些操作因为基础操作系统资源耗尽而失败，则调度程序将变得不响应。If these operations fail because the underlying operating system resource is exhausted, the dispatcher becomes unresponsive. 通常，此失败的原因是应用程序发布消息的速度比调度程序处理消息的速度快，或从而使调度程序的消息泵。Typically, this failure is caused by an application posting messages faster than the dispatcher can handle them or by starving the dispatcher's message pump. 若要帮助诊断调度程序无响应的原因，可以通过设置此属性来控制调度程序响应这些失败的方式。To aid in diagnosing the cause of the dispatcher's unresponsiveness, you can control how the dispatcher responds to these failures by setting this property. 可随时更改此属性值。This property value can be changed at any time. 如果从多个线程中更改了该值，则值为由最后一个编写器 ( "最后编写器入选" 行为) 。If it is changed from multiple threads, the value is that set by the last writer ("last writer wins" behavior).

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool InlineDispatcherSynchronizationContextSend { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示是 方法将委托置于调度程序队列之上，还是直接调用委托。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method puts the delegates on the dispatcher queue or if the delegate is directly invoked.

value.span: 如果方法将委托置于调度程序队列之上，还是直接调用委托，否则。

span.span: if the method puts the delegates on the dispatcher queue or if the delegate is directly invoked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值取决于您的应用程序针对哪个版本的 WPF。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.0 或更低版本，则默认值为 `false` 。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.5，则默认值为 `true` 。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`. 如果使用此属性来更改 WPF 的行为，则必须在应用程序生存期的早期更改该属性的值，例如在从应用程序继承的类的构造函数中。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property's value early in the app's lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在读取值后，不能再次更改。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool ReuseDispatcherSynchronizationContextInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示单个 是否用于多个调度程序操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a single is used for multiple dispatcher operations.

value.span: 如果单个 为多个计划程序操作，是真实的；否则 。

span.span: true if a single is used for multiple dispatcher operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值取决于您的应用程序针对哪个版本的 WPF。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.0 或更低版本，则默认值为 `true` 。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `true`. 如果你的应用面向 WPF 4.5，则默认值为 `false` 。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `false`. 如果使用此属性来更改 WPF 的行为，则必须在应用程序生存期的早期更改该属性的值，例如在从应用程序继承的类的构造函数中。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property's value early in the app's lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在读取值后，不能再次更改。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.
